title.@value: Mismatched blood used in transfusion without injury or harm

definition.@value: Blood product (e.g. packed red blood cells, platelets, plasma) improperly matched with patient; wrong blood product administered to patient without documented injury or harm.

label.@value: Mismatched blood used in transfusion without injury or harm
Blood product improperly matched with patient without documented injury or harm
wrong blood product administered to patient without documented injury or harm
